channel.title: Experiences on Pritpal Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Pritpal Singh

item.title: Experience
item.description: Professional Experience Ex Co-Founder Role: Managed Product Development Spearheaded strategic initiatives to optimize online visibility for agencies, leading to a significant boost in web traffic and engagement. Led a team of 6 to develop the internet presence of agencies and boosted web presence. Increased advertising results by 30% using modern marketing methods across different platforms. Oversaw all stages from concept to launch, ensuring alignment with market needs and user feedback.
